de.lambeck.pned.elements.data

Interface IDataNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataElement, IElement, INode
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDataTransition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataNode, DataPlace, DataTransition

    public interface IDataNode
extends IDataElement, INode
    Sub type of INode for nodes in a IDataModel.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPred(IDataArc newArc)
      Adds an IDataArc to the list of predecessors (incoming).
      void addSucc(IDataArc newArc)
      Adds an arc to the list of successors (outgoing).

      This method returns a list of all predecessors of the node.

        void removePred(IDataArc arc)
         throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Removes the specified arc from the list of predecessors.
        Parameters:
        arc - The specified IDataArc
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If this arc does not exist

      • removeSucc

        void removeSucc(IDataArc arc)
         throws java.util.NoSuchElementException

        arc - The specified IDataArc
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If this arc does not exist

      • getPredElems

        java.util.List<IDataArc> getPredElems()
        This method returns a list of all predecessors of the node. If the node has no predecessors, the method returns null.
        Returns:
        A List of all predecessors

      • getSuccElems

        java.util.List<IDataArc> getSuccElems()
        This method returns a list of all successors of the node. If the node has no successors, the method returns null.
        Returns:
        A List of all successors

      • predListContains

        boolean predListContains(IDataArc arc)
        Returns true if this nodes list of predecessors contains the specified arc.
        Parameters:
        arc - The specified IDataArc
        Returns:
        True if arc is in the predecessor list; otherwise false

      • succListContains

        boolean succListContains(IDataArc arc)
        Returns true if this nodes list of successors contains the specified arc.
        Parameters:
        arc - The specified IDataArc
        Returns:
        True if arc is in the successor list; otherwise false
